title: Game crashes, so I get penalized?
body: I get into my first league game of the 2017 season and the whole game bugs and crashes, resulting in me being put on a low priority game list. I now have to wait 10 minutes to que up. This is in no way my fault that your game bugged me out. Nothing like this has happened before, so please fix this issue.

replies.body: Multiple leaves can result in a lower priority queue by the [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ), so it's really important to get this fixed or the timer will escalate.  What do you mean exactly by game crashes or bugs?  Are there error messages?  When is it happening?  Happy to help!
